meanings.definition: A member of a group of indigenous people living in India and Bangladesh.
meanings.sent1: The santal wore traditional clothing during the festival.
meanings.sent2: Many santal live in villages and follow their customs.
meanings.sent3: The santal decided to have a dance-off with the tourists.
meanings.sent4: The santal spirit is as strong as the roots of the ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the santal brightened up the celebration.

meanings.definition: A language spoken by the Santal people.
meanings.sent1: Learning santal helped me communicate with the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The santal language has unique sounds and rhythms.
meanings.sent3: The parrot tried to mimic the santal words but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her voice flowed like a river singing in santal.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they practiced speaking santal phrases.

meanings.definition: Relating to the Santal people or their language.
meanings.sent1: She admired the santal artwork displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The santal culture is rich in traditions and stories.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy had a santal charm around its neck.
meanings.sent4: His words had a santal rhythm that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The santal music echoed through the hills, enchanting all who listened.
